alert.note: Alert for Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; South Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 3:29AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...NEAR CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS ACROSS PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN MINNESOTA... Relative humidity values will drop below 30 percent along with southerly winds gusting to 20 to 25 mph across portions of northwestern Minnesota. Given the extremely dry fuels, near critical fire weather conditions are expected for the afternoon and early evening hours. Any fire that does develop has the potential to quickly spread. For more information on burning restrictions for Minnesota, see www.dnr.state.mn.us/forestry/fire/firerating_restrictions.html

area.areaDesc: Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami; South Beltrami
